description: This Java class defines a global exception handler for a Spring Boot application. It captures different types of exceptions and returns structured error response entities with HTTP status codes and error details.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring ControllerAdvice class that handles various application exceptions and returns standardized responses.

methods.name: body
methods.description: Constructs a Map representing the error body with timestamp, status, error, and message fields.

methods.name: handleBadRequest
methods.description: Handles BadRequestException and returns a 400 Bad Request response.

methods.name: handleUnprocessable
methods.description: Handles UnprocessableEntityException and returns a 422 Unprocessable Entity response.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles validation errors from MethodArgumentNotValidException and returns a 400 Bad Request with details.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Catches all other exceptions and returns a 500 Internal Server Error response.
